title: infinite recursion of datalad ls  when create-sibling
body:
```shell
mvdoc    12944  0.0  0.0  14228  3760 ?        S    20:34   0:00   /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
mvdoc    12949  0.0  0.0  14228  3756 ?        S    20:34   0:00     /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
mvdoc    12954  0.0  0.0  14228  3596 ?        S    20:34   0:00       /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
mvdoc    12959  0.0  0.0  14228  3720 ?        S    20:34   0:00         /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
mvdoc    12964  0.0  0.0  14228  3728 ?        S    20:34   0:00           /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
mvdoc    12969  0.0  0.0  14228  3700 ?        S    20:34   0:00             /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
mvdoc    12974  0.0  0.0  14228  3720 ?        S    20:34   0:00               /bin/bash /usr/local/bin/datalad ls -a --json file /srv/dbic.datalad.org/www/Heatherton/Stanger/1004_ontrack
...
```
not sure yet what is going on

```shell
datalad --version
datalad 0.4.dev270
```
